verbose_text: The same investigator recently found that the antioxidant genistein alleviates testicular IRI induced spermatogenic damage and oxidative stress by suppressing the aberrant testicular matrix metalloproteinase system via the Notch 2/Jagged 1/Hes-1 and caspase-8 pathways.
evidence: genistein alleviates testicular IRI-induced spermatogenic damage and oxidative stress by suppressing the aberrant testicular matrix
